alert.note: Alert for Isanti; Kanabec; Mille Lacs (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:41PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Kanabec, southern Mille Lacs and northwestern Isanti Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Milaca, or 28 miles northwest of Cambridge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bock around 250 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ogilvie, Mora, Brunswick, Grasston and Quamba. This includes U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 189 and 202. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and east central Minnesota.
